MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a safe repair of a damaged underground cable, caused by a third party, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on Monday, 8th February 2021.
